Episodes.Title: Revenge Is Best Served Cold
Episodes.Plot: Catherine and Nick become absorbed in the dangerous world of street racing after the body of one of the illegal sport's drivers is found in the desert at an abandoned airstrip. Grissom and his crew probe the sudden death of a renowned poker player who had a violent convulsion during a high-stakes game.
Episodes.GuestStars: Josef Cannon, Ian Somerhalder, Cliff DeYoung, Madison Mason, J.P. Pitoc, Todd Stashwick, Mike Bunin, Andrea DeOliveira, Christopher Gehrman, Doug Jones, Hilary Shepard Turner, Donna Scott, Carmine Giovinazzo, Wal

Episodes.Title: The Accused Is Entitled
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and the team investigate the death of a young woman found in the hotel room of a popular actor.
Episodes.GuestStars: Chad Michael Murray, Raymond J. Barry, Lindsay Frost, Michael B. Silver, Michael Ensign, Marta Martin, David Purdham, Linda Kim, Tom Kuehl, J. Antonio Moon, Nancy Yoon, Shahid Ali, Nate Bynum, C.C. Carr, Jamal Cla

Episodes.Title: Let the Seller Beware
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and Catherine investigate the murder of a wealthy couple who are discovered outside  their glamorous home, which was up for sale. Sara probes the death of a cheerleader who is found eviscerated on a soccer field, her organs having been ingested by her killer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Chris Payne Gilbert, Mary-Margaret Humes, Taylor Handley, Nicole Paggi, Laurie Fortier, Monique Demers, Edward Edwards, Peter Asle Holden, Chris Johnson, Michael McLafferty, Rachel Shumate, Kendra D. Smith, Mary

Episodes.Title: A Little Murder
Episodes.Plot: Grissom suspects murder when the body of a dwarf is found hanging from a rope high above a stage in a casino hotel where a convention of little people is being held. Catherine is attacked at a crime scene where a man was murdered during what appears to have been a home invasion.
Episodes.GuestStars: Arlene Malinowski, Andy Mackenzie, Matthew Lang, Jack Galle, Greg Dohanic, Michael Gilden, Kaarina Aufranc, Linden Ashby, Danny Woodburn, Meredith Eaton, Phil Fondacaro

Episodes.Title: Abra Cadaver
Episodes.Plot: Grissom investigates when a woman vanishes while taking part in a magician's act. A rock star's death on a band bus appears to be the result of an overdose, but Catherine uncovers evidence that points to murder.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lawrence Monoson, Tom Noonan, Jennifer Sky, Jon Sklaroff, Esteban Powell, Catherine Grace, Sven Holmberg, Blumes Tracy, Jack McGee, Tushka Bergen, Salvator Xuereb, Jack McGee

Episodes.Title: The Execution of Catherine Willows
Episodes.Plot:
15 years previously, Catherine helped put a man  on death row for the rape and murder of a college co-ed. Just as he is abut to be executed, 
another girl at the same school is murdered in similar circumstances.
Episodes.GuestStars: Beth Grant, Wade Williams, Wayne PÃ©re, Viola Davis, David Lee Smith, Victor Bevine, Phe Caplan, Michael Chieffo, John Goodwin, Nikki Danielle Moore

Episodes.Title: Fight Night
Episodes.Plot: A boxing champ dies in the ring, but Grissom finds evidence that points to murder. Catherine works a crime scene where a Los Angeles gang member was gunned down. Nick investigates a jewelery-store robbery.
Episodes.GuestStars: Roma Maffia, Khalil Kain, Greg Serano, Jennifer Aspen, Ron Canada, Richard Biggs, Carlos Cervantes, Dawn Marie Church, Pete Cunningham, Rick Fitzgerald, Charley Rossman, Ricky Aiello, Ryan Cutrona, Marty Rackham

Episodes.Title: Snuff
Episodes.Plot: Catherine is called in by a pornographic-film developer to view graphic footage from a snuff movie. Grissom investigates when a body, smothered with fire ants, is found stuffed inside a large toolbox.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tyler Christopher, William Mapother, Niecy Nash, Sal Lopez, Stephen Spacek, Larry Clarke, Meredith Giangrande, Blair Williamson, Sam Hennings

Episodes.Title: Blood Lust
Episodes.Plot: A taxi driver feels his cab strike something, then finds a teenage boy pinned beneath the left rear tire, apparently killed on impact. When Grissom arrives on the scene, he discovers that the teen has been eviscerated and has stab wounds, but shows no signs of having been struck by the taxi.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: William Winter, Eric Ritter, Victoria Prescott, Mary Jo Mrochinski, Tim Mikulecky, David Meunier, Matthew Kaminsky, Bryan Friday, Candace Edwards, Brandon Mauro, Michael Welch, James Macdonald, Gina Philips, Anju

Episodes.Title: High and Low
Episodes.Plot: Grissom, Warrick and Nick investigate the case of man murdered by being pushed off a six storey building. Catherine looks into the murder of man outside his regular bar.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Cynthia Preston, Catherine MacNeal, Leslie Bega, Michael Trucco, Richard Burgi, Cooper Thornton, Colleen Porch, Philip McNiven, Sal Landi, Jeremy Jimenez, Dennis Cockrum, Justice Coleman, Carl Paoli, Rain Denise

Episodes.Title: Recipe for Murder
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and Catherine investigate a meat grinder murder at an abattoir. Warrick and Sara look into the apparent suicide of a young woman.
Episodes.Director: J. Miller Tobin, Richard J. Lewis
Episodes.GuestStars: Daniel Hagen, Marita Geraghty, Robert Mailhouse, Kimberly Huie, Darren Pettie, Chad Lindberg, Perrey Reeves, Cameron Mathison, Lori Rom, Scott MacDonald, Larry Clarke, Pat Asanti, Dan Dixon, Iva Hasperger, Cameron

Episodes.Title: Got Murder?
Episodes.Plot: The finding of a raven with a human eyeball in its mouth leads the team to a divorced man and his 2 children. Warrick and Grissom look into the circumstances of David's unusual and first autopsy.
Episodes.GuestStars: Marc Lynn, David Starzyk, Joel McKinnon Miller, Jules Sylvester, Joe Ochman, Colton James, Doan Ly, Candace Edwards, Evan Rachel Wood, Rebecca Boyd, Allison Smith, Joey Slotnick, Michael O'Keefe

Episodes.Title: Random Acts of Violence
Episodes.Plot: Warrick investigates the drive-by murder of a young girl in his old neighbourhood. Nick tackles the murder of a computer company employee.
Episodes.GuestStars: Keith David, Dwayne L. Barnes, Maury Sterling, Kevin Chapman, David Packer, Jim Rash, Tom Virtue, Daniel Farris, Chanel Gaines, Barry Sigismondi, Shawn H. Smith, Ty Upshaw

Episodes.Title: One Hit Wonder
Episodes.Plot: Catherine investigates an escalating series of peeping tom incidents. Sara reopens the dormant case of her friend, a DA.
Episodes.GuestStars: Elizabeth Mitchell, Devon Gummersall, Leslie Grossman, Joseph Mazzello, Jeff Kober, Rick Worthy, Chad Morgan, Hallie Lambert, Frank Novak, Ingrid Raines, Joe Michael Burke

Episodes.Title: Lady Heather's Box
Episodes.Plot: Grissom's investigation into the murder of two men leads him to a new encounter with Lady Heather. Catherine is desperate to discover what lead to the near-death of her daughter and why her ex-husband disappeared.
Episodes.Writer: Carol Mendelsohn, Andrew Lipsitz, Eli Talbert, Naren
Episodes.GuestStars: Melinda Clarke, Michael Riley, Amy Pietz, Elizabeth Berkley, Timothy Carhart, Pauley Perrette, Samuel Ball, Shayne Anderson, Kata Dobo, David Fogg, Tomiko Fraser, Rib Hillis, P.B. Hutton, Sandra McCoy, Alimi Balla

Episodes.Title: Lucky Strike
Episodes.Plot: After a man driving with a wooden stake in his head dies in front of a casino, Grissom and Nick work to discover the 'vampire' killer. Warrick and Catherine hunt for the killer of an NBA star's 5 year old son.
Episodes.GuestStars: Dwayne Adway, Tracy Middendorf, Leslie Silva, Mahershalalhashbaz Ali, Cameron Daddo, Sam Jaeger, Loren Lazerine, Christina Christian, Tequan Richmond, Alexandra Lee, Jimm Giannini, Steffon Sam

Episodes.Title: Crash and Burn
Episodes.Plot: An elderly woman crashes her car into a crowded restaurant. Grissom and Nick investigate the possible carbon monoxide murder of a woman in her home.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeremy Roberts, Dahlia Salem, Christopher Gorham, Kim Gillingham, Tom Lagleder, Todd E. Slayton, Nicole Basandra, John Dixon, Sandy Gimpel, Christopher Leps, Pat Millicano, Kevin Richardson, James Sutorius, Jonat

Episodes.Title: Precious Metal
Episodes.Plot: Catherine, Nick and Sara investigate a seemingly months old body found in the mountains. Warrick and Grissom look into the case of a man found murdered in an alley, but the medical examiner 'loses' the body for 11 days.
Episodes.GuestStars: Katherine La Nasa, Matt Winston, Garret Dillahunt, Matt DeCaro, Blake Adams, Sarah Lancaster, Pippi Boecher, Chris Crotty, Wiley Pickett, Craig Welzbecher

Episodes.Title: A Night at the Movies
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and Catherine investigate the murder of a movie-goer. The rest of the team reach a forensic impasse while processing a teenager who died from a gunshot wound.
Episodes.GuestStars: Xhercis, Erik Smith, Mathew Scollon, Eric Marquette, Michael Jon Hennessy, Knate Gwaltney, Peter Dobson, Cyia Batten, Finn Carter, Megan Ward, Charlie Hofheimer, Kevin Christy, Todd Giebenhain

Episodes.Title: Last Laugh
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and Catherine investigate the murder of a despised comic who died onstage, apparently after drinking from a tainted bottle of water. Brass reopens a woman's accidental-death case after spotting the deceased's husband in a flashy new car with a trophy date on his arm.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bobcat Goldthwait, Jeffrey Ross, Gilbert Gottfried, Bryan Callen, Alan Blumenfeld, Jeff Perry, Tom Gallop, Anthony E. Zuiker, Sandra Purpuro, Maggie Wheeler, Leslie Bega, Larry Thomas, Molly Weber, Bryan Callen

Episodes.Title: Forever
Episodes.Plot: A horse trainer is found dead in the cargo bay of a private 747 carrying 12 well-heeled passengers and a million-dollar show horse. In Death Valley, Sara and Warrick probe the apparent suicide of a 15-year-old boy found under a bedspread.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lee Garlington, Patrick Fabian, Susan Walters, Jonathan Slavin, Olivia Friedman, Christinna Chauncey, Kara Houston, Nichael Lawson, Doan Ly, Keith Mackechnie, Cheryl McWilliams, Jill Noel, Nigel Gibbs, Lisa Wilho

Episodes.Title: Play with Fire
Episodes.Plot: A woman's body is discovered in a small press box at a high-school football field, apparently the victim of strangulation.  An explosion in the Crime Lab destroys key evidence and injures Greg and Sara.
Episodes.GuestStars: Olivia Rosewood, Bob Gunton, Max Martini, Luis Antonio Ramos, Rebecca McFarland, Brandon Kirsch, Josh Jacobson, Danielle Panabaker, Raymond Cruz, Luis Antonio Ramos

Episodes.Title: Inside the Box
Episodes.Plot: Three masked bandits steal a safe-deposit box from a Las Vegas bank in a daring daytime heist. Catherine follows the evidence to the casino owner, who is like a father to her. Grissom's hearing gets progressively worse and he asks Doc Robbins for help.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Shamus Wiles, David Selburg, Emilio Rivera, Christie Lynn Smith, Scott DeFoe, Lawrence McNeal III, Jimmy Jax Pinchak
